To: EQCheats@onelist.com

Subject: [EQCheats] Digest Number 11


Have you visited the new ONElist home page lately?
http://www.ONElist.com
ONElist: The Leading e-mail list and community service on the Internet!

goto www.everquest.com

Message: 1
Date: Tue, 27 Apr 1999 10:27:16 EDT
From: XxKommiexX@...
Subject: Re: Blacksmithing

Hmmmm, thanks for the info. I think it might be hard because I am in
Neriak
with my smith. I do not think there are any armor molds there, skewers
are
not there either. I may just resort to making a new character in
Freeport
area to get all the stuff I need, I hear that Freeport is home to 2 of
the
banded making smiths on my server. What server your friend play? Thanks
for
the info, hope to be able to make banded soon.

Message: 3
Date: Tue, 27 Apr 1999 13:05:26 -0700 (PDT)
From: Heather <heathers24@...>
Subject: Re: blacksmithing

I read that making skewers was a very good way to raise your
blacksmithing
to master level. and not as expensive as most things.



I would ask this on the blacksmithing list but I think they are against
cheats over there, so here it goes. I was wondering how to raise
blacksmithing the fastest? I know it would take a lot of money, but as
of
right now, I know of 3 people that can make banded. I am sure there is
more,
but for an entire world, that is no good. Good for them, but not for
everyone
else. I would like to become a good smith, and make banded. I have 24 in
the
smithing skill now. I have tried just to keep making studs, as you still
gain
skill for failing, but is there anything else that would raise it
faster? Any
cheats as this is what this list is about?

Thanks,
Sarn, Veeshan Server
